abstract: Triple Crown winner American Pharoah is named 2015 horse of year at Eclipse Awards.
snippet: Pharoah, the winner of the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup Classic, was named the 2015 horse of the year and the top 3-year-old male at the Eclipse Awards.
lead_paragraph: Pharoah, the winner of the Triple Crown and the Breeders’ Cup Classic, was named the 2015 horse of the year and the top 3-year-old male at the Eclipse Awards.
